evidence.enforcement_point: git commit signing with SSH key

evidence.claim: Hello Cloud function deployed to GCP and publicly accessible
evidence.enforcement_point: GCP Cloud Functions gen2 deployment with HTTP trigger

evidence.claim: Dark-pattern lab 1 completed: dark and ethical ToS acceptance designs with documentation
evidence.command: Created dark.md, ethical.md, reflection.md, tos_acceptance_dark.html, tos_acceptance_ethical.html
evidence.output: docs/ethics/dark-pattern-lab-1/ with 5 files (dark design + techniques, ethical redesign + rationale, reflection on effectiveness)

evidence.claim: Ethical ToS promises (material terms visible, both choices accessible) specified with Clause, Control, Test, and enforcement point
evidence.command: Created cct.md with 2 CCT entries: (1) material terms visible — content assertion/CI; (2) both choices equally accessible — structure+visibility assertion/CI
evidence.output: cct.md with clause (falsifiable), control, red-bar test, enforcement point for each promise

evidence.claim: Capstone team repo URL recorded in capstone/team_repo.txt
evidence.command: Added team repo URL to capstone/team_repo.txt

evidence.claim: Design pack deliverable complete: 5 claims, 5 CCT entries, 5 ethics ledger entries, 5 evidence plans — all cross-referenced and validated by cctChecker agent
evidence.command: git diff HEAD~1 --stat (docs/claims.md, docs/cct_v1.md, docs/ethics_ledger_v1.md, docs/evidence_plan.md updated)
evidence.output: 4 files changed, 49 insertions, 13 deletions. Claims 4-5 filled, CCT rows 4-5 filled with full clause text in all rows, 3 new ethics ledger entries, evidence plans for claims 4-5 added.
